Comments_List: This series was an interesting and engaging group of speakers, but it could be improved in the future with a bit more inclusion of topics relevant to all grad students and labs within the social area.

The speaker lineup this year was great - diverse voices presenting a variety of topics, all with a high degree of excellence. The opportunity to lunch with speakers afterward also really contributed a lot.
I mean, this course is required for social psych students, but I would recommend to students from other areas too, based on the speaker quality this year.
